mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.certificate_name AS "certificateName", a.certificate_type_id AS "certificateTypeId", a.description AS "description", a.unit_id AS "unitId", a.unit_name AS "unitName", a.owner_type AS "ownerType", a.effective_date_start AS "effectiveDateStart", a.effective_date_end AS "effectiveDateEnd", a.status AS "status", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.path AS "path", a.is_issue AS "isIssue", a.issue_date AS "issueDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a11.name AS "area.name", o6.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o6 ON o6.id = a.unit_name LEFT JOIN sys_area a11 ON a11.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO certificate_library( id, certificate_name, certificate_type_id, description, unit_id, unit_name, owner_type, effective_date_start, effective_date_end, status, area_id, path, is_issue, issue_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{certificateName}, #{certificateTypeId}, #{description}, #{unitId}, #{office.id}, #{ownerType}, #{effectiveDateStart}, #{effectiveDateEnd}, #{status}, #{area.id}, #{path}, #{isIssue}, #{issueDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE certificate_library SET certificate_name = #{certificateName}, description = #{description}, unit_name = #{office.id}, owner_type = #{ownerType}, effective_date_start = #{effectiveDateStart}, effective_date_end = #{effectiveDateEnd}, status = #{status}, area_id = #{area.id}, path = #{path}, is_issue = #{isIssue}, issue_date = #{issueDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
